# Code used in the editor to apply RGB colors to objects based on their stencil value. Stencil value is set based on class ids as listed here - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dtWZOmYr40xc2fasLo63aJB1KFXmuWoDXGafoAJHf6U/edit#gid=1058311551.

int allcolor[339] = {153,108,6,112,105,191,89,121,72,190,225,64,206,190,59,81,13,36,115,176,195,161,171,27,135,169,180,29,26,199,102,16,239,242,107,146,156,198,23,49,89,160,68,218,116,11,236,9,196,30,8,121,67,28,0,53,65,146,52,70,226,149,143,151,126,171,194,39,7,205,120,161,212,51,60,211,80,208,189,135,188,54,72,205,103,252,157,124,21,123,19,132,69,195,237,132,94,253,175,182,251,87,90,162,242,199,29,1,254,12,229,35,196,244,220,163,49,86,254,214,152,3,129,92,31,106,207,229,90,125,75,48,98,55,74,126,129,238,222,153,109,85,152,34,173,69,31,37,128,125,58,19,33,134,57,119,218,124,115,120,0,200,225,131,92,246,90,16,51,155,241,202,97,155,184,145,182,96,232,44,133,244,133,180,191,29,1,222,192,99,242,104,91,168,219,65,54,217,148,66,130,203,102,204,216,78,75,234,20,250,109,206,24,164,194,17,157,23,236,158,114,88,245,22,110,67,17,35,181,213,93,170,179,42,52,187,148,247,200,111,25,62,174,100,25,240,191,195,144,252,36,67,241,77,149,237,33,141,119,230,85,28,34,108,78,98,254,114,161,30,75,50,243,66,226,253,46,104,76,8,234,216,15,241,102,93,14,71,192,255,193,253,41,164,24,175,120,185,243,231,169,233,97,243,215,145,72,137,21,160,113,101,214,92,13,167,140,147,101,109,181,53,118,126,3,177,32,40,63,99,186,139,153,88,207,100,71,146,227};
if (StencilValue.x > 0)
{  
return float3(allcolor[3*(StencilValue.x-1)+0], allcolor[3*(StencilValue.x-1)+1], allcolor[3*(StencilValue.x-1)+2])/255.0;
}
return float3(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
